timeline.bodyText: Did we not extend AtlasDbFactory because then we run into having two factories of same type? Not a complaint, just asking for a friend :P
timeline.author: gmaretic

replies.bodyText:
I didn't even think of that, actually - I went with the standard "prefer composition over inheritance" design principle here. You're right that that would have been a problem with the inheritance model...
Some of it, though, is also to restrict the visibility to users. I don't want people to try getting the timestamp invalidator, or calling createRawKvs with some of the other config options set.
